code:
stateDiagram-v2
    direction LR

    [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] --> SCHEDULED: Admin creates broadcast for distant future
    [HealthTech_PatientRecords] --> PREPARING: Admin creates immediate broadcast (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)

    SCHEDULED --> PREPARING: Pre-computation scheduler runs
    SCHEDULED --> CANCELLED: Admin cancels
    
    PREPARING --> READY: Async user fetch succeeds
    PREPARING --> FAILED: Async user fetch fails
    PREPARING --> CANCELLED: Admin cancels
    
    READY --> ACTIVE: Activation scheduler runs (HealthTech_PatientRecords)
    READY --> CANCELLED: Admin cancels
    
    ACTIVE --> EXPIRED: Expiration scheduler runs
    ACTIVE --> CANCELLED: Admin cancels via API
    ACTIVE --> FAILED: DLT event for group broadcast is consumed
    
    EXPIRED --> [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
    CANCELLED --> [HealthTech_PatientRecords]
    FAILED --> [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
